examples.example: 我用彩椒做出了美味又好看的菜肴。

translate.english: I made delicious and good-looking dishes with colorful peppers.

examples.example: 我用彩椒和其他食材搭配，烹饪出了色彩缤纷且营养丰富的佳肴。

translate.english: I used colorful peppers and other ingredients to cook a colorful and nutritious delicacy.

examples.example: 我用彩椒绘制了一幅充满创意和趣味的画作。

translate.english: I used colorful peppers to draw a painting full of creativity and fun.
